column7: Good lunch in retro style environment
column9:
This family owned restaurant serves lunch only, with good quality and in the former International Student House, still with some 1950s retro feeling. 

The menu is limited to two today's specials "dagens rätt" and a short a la carte menu. Well prepared, tasty food. Can...More

I usually ate lunch here as near my working place. Menù is varying each day and can choose a la carte.
Food is good quality.

The cook is sort of decent, you might like it or not, depending on the day's menu. 
Does not serve dinners
We were working close by and enjoyed the convenience to get a nice meal in a short time. Like mentioned before it's like a Mensa or canteen. The food is good and a lot of value for money.

column7: Nice place for a quick lunch
